content:
I didn't think about tracking my progress. I think I'll use a habit tracker app on my phone to monitor my social media use and stay accountable. That way, I can see how I'm doing and make adjustments as needed. I'll also set reminders for my scheduled video calls with friends and family to make sure I don't forget.

I'm also thinking about finding alternative activities to replace social media use. I've been wanting to start a journaling habit, so maybe I'll use that time to write in my journal instead of scrolling through social media. What do you think about journaling as a way to reflect and stay mindful?
